message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase my product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value to you, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still unable to meet at $12,500. Would $11,000 be within your consideration?
